replies.body:
If you really feel like you've mastered all those skills, man, you should start sending applications to LCS teams...

Seriously. Until you own your elo, you won't improve. There is no elo hell - if there was, all the high level players that do bronze-to-diamond runs would be stuck in bronze for weeks. But they're not, they cruise through them. The only reason you're at your elo is YOU. Own it. Figure out what it is you're doing that could be done better, and work on it. If you belong in a higher elo, you WILL get there. Only thing holding you out of gold is attitude and time.

You need 4 things to get out of silver - 

a) a champ or two you are REALLY familiar
b) win in lane with decent cs
c) once you push down your tower, help other lanes push tower
d) stick with adc and make sure you peel 

remember, once your lane is done then you shouldn't go and do wraiths or have a campout in the jungle. Go help others, and keep sticking to objectives. Ping ping ping and remember step (d) is VERY important


that's how i got out of silver :)
